short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate directly to ChatGPT and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Tobny," a browser extension that's all about making your web browsing a breeze. Think of it as your virtual sidekick for online exploration.

You can also kick off a ChatGPT conversation right from that search bar. It's like having a chat with a friend who knows everything about the internet. And, of course, if things get too experimental, Tobny's got your back and falls back to good old Google.

So, dive into the world of Tobny, where browsing is a little more laid-back and a little more fun.
